reviewText:
I bought the 1st DVD series over a year ago- Learn Fencing (A Beginner's Guide Sword Fighting) which covers Foil, Épée, & Sabre. A great technical reference guide to fencing.
  This new DVD Learn Fencing: Advance sabre is a great tool for the beginner to intermediate sabre fencer. I am a Épée and Foil fencer that dapples in Sabre fencing once in a while. This advanced DVD series is more like it complete guide to fencing and preparation for competition. I picked up a lot of nice sabre specific fencing drills I can work on by myself or with a partner. I learned some nice tricks in this video too.
I don't just recommend this advance sabre dvd, I recommend a whole series, Épée, Foil, and Sabre.
